name: College of Spirits
description: Bards of the College of Spirits channel stories and legends from beyond the veil, invoking supernatural tales that manifest as powerful, unpredictable effects.

3.name: Guiding Whispers
3.description: You learn the guidance cantrip. It doesnâ€™t count against the number of bard cantrips you know. You also learn the augury spell, which you can cast without expending a spell slot once per long rest.

3.name: Tales from Beyond
3.description: As a bonus action, you expend one use of Bardic Inspiration and roll on the Tales from Beyond table to determine a supernatural effect.

6.name: Spiritual Focus
6.description: You can use a spiritual focus as a spellcasting focus for your bard spells, and you gain a bonus to healing or damage dealt by bard spells.

14.name: Mystical Connection
14.description: When you roll on the Tales from Beyond table, you can roll twice and choose which result to use.
